title: Valuation Act 2001 (No.13 of 2001), and the Valuation Office and Valuation
heading: 1. This Regulation may be cited as the Valuation Act 2001 (Application to
text_raw:
1. This Regulation may be cited as the Valuation Act 2001 (Application to 

Commissioner) (Amendment of Fees) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited valuation act 2001 (application commissioner) (amendment fees) regulation 2021

title: Valuation Act 2001 (No.13 of 2001), and the Valuation Office and Valuation
heading: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 1 September, 2021.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations come into operation on 1 September, 2021.

title: Valuation Act 2001 (No.13 of 2001), and the Valuation Office and Valuation
heading: 3. The Valuation Act 2001 (Application to Commissioner) (Fees)
text_raw:
3. The Valuation Act 2001 (Application to Commissioner) (Fees) 
Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 303 of 2015) is amended by deleting Regulation 
4(a).
